title: Support nested comments
body:
by **dowobeha**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. Write a Go program
2. /* Add this line and things work fine */
3. /* /* Add this line and things don't work. */ */


What is the expected output? What do you see instead?

Expected output is a clean compile.

Actual output is: "syntax error near main"


What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?

GOOS=386
GOARCH=darwin

Which revision are you sync'ed to?  (hg log -l 1)
